hero.title: Surprise Me
hero.subtitle: Add a colorful border to any webpage
hero.description: A simple browser extension that adds a customizable colored border to any webpage. Perfect for screenshots, presentations, and visual distinction between environments.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Choose from a variety of colors or create your own custom color.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: One-click activation and deactivation. No complicated settings.

crossBrowser.title: Cross-Browser
crossBrowser.description: Available for Chrome, Firefox, and Safari browsers.

download.title: Download
download.subtitle: Get started with SurpriseMe in just a few clicks. Available for Chrome browser.
download.step3: Drag and drop the downloaded file

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We respect your privacy. This extension does not collect any personal data.
privacy.detailedPolicy: This extension (SurpriseMe) does not collect, store, share, or upload any personal information, sensitive data, or browsing history.
privacy.localStorageInfo: All settings and data are kept locally in your browser and used only for personalization of the extension.
privacy.contactInfo: For any questions, please contact the developer:

languageManager.title: Language Manager
languageManager.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this language?
